quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“demography”（人口统计学）或词根“derm”（皮革）的误导，将“dermatology”错解为人口统计学或皮革制品研究学。
quiz_item.sentence: After noticing persistent acne on her face, Lisa decided to consult a specialist in **dermatology** for treatment.

option.definition: The study of skin and its diseases
The study of teeth and their diseases
